pr_title: Plugin Hub: Reorder plugin panel and rework the search function

timeline.message: Plugin Hub: Rework search to something remotely useful

timeline.bodyText: this can throw npe, and I'm not sure its even a good idea
timeline.author: abextm

replies.bodyText: Updated (and marked description/tags as nullable). And at least for now imo it is fine (as long as external plugin descriptions make sense, and atm most of them do).
replies.author: deathbeam
